document_data.name: Goldcoin House
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Goldcoin House''' was the [[Waukeen]]ar shrine built in the small town of [[Asbravn]]. Both the town and shrine were situated in an out-of-the-way region of [[Sunset Vale]], at the junction of the [[Dusk Road]] and the [[Uldoon Trail]].

It was one of several shrines found in town, including those dedicated to [[Morningstone House|Lathander]] and [[A House of Joy|Llira]], built around the more prominent [[House of the Suffering God]], a temple dedicated to [[Ilmater]].
